name: web-transitions-sample
description: A simple JavaScript workflow management system.

scripts.start: echo 'There is no start. Just open public/index.html'
scripts.build: browserify --transform es6ify --standalone WebWorkflow src/web-workflow/index.js -o dist/web-workflow-bundle.js; browserify --transform es6ify --standalone WebWorkflow src/workflow-child/index.js -o dist/workflow-child-bundle.js
